name: James Hadson
Text3: As a programmer, I can say that this is just the perfect device for work. The battery lasts more than 10 hours, even when watching movies and TV shows.

name: Kathrine Lowrance
Text3: I switched to Mac 11 years ago, and for that entire period, I had the same laptop, a Macbook Pro, late-2011 model. After the initial adjustment, it has been a great laptop for all of these years.

name: Maryann Mendoza
Text3: Passive cooling makes this laptop silent. Which is just perfect for audio recording. In addition, it will never get clogged with dust.

name: Zara Adele
Text3: I was skeptical of the finless design having had Intel MacBook Airs that ran very warm. So far this Apple silicon MacBook has stayed cool to touch. Honestly, I think a M1 MacBook is all many really need for general use cases. I highly recommend a MacBook Air over any PC notebook.

name: Winslet Dekota
Text3: The only exception is when I edit 4k material for video in Davinci Resolve. There, the battery lasts for 3-4 hours. Just like in games. Although I don't play games on this laptop. I ran Froetnite once for a test, I liked it in principle and the FPS was stable 60+.

name: Ron Ven
Text3: It's also very convenient that it can be charged via Type-C cable. By the way, I use a third-party charger and there are no problems with this at all.
